alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Florence; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 8:29PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Florence, southwestern Dillon and northwestern Marion Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 829 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Francis Marion University, or 10 miles east of Florence, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Claussen, Blue Brick, Francis Marion University, and Mars Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
